message: Welcome! Our products are carefully selected with a 50% chance of being high-quality. Given the current market, the value of our products might not be immediately apparent. However, rest assured that we stand behind our offerings. For this round, you're looking at a low-quality item. Our prices are fixed, with no room for negotiation, and once purchased, there are no refunds. Considering the uncertainty, I invite you to take a chance on us. If you're interested, please proceed with your purchase. Thank you for considering our product!
